overview: I stole this album from the tatuk's locker, and he stupidly shouted after: Before you, good fellows, is a concert of the Canadian band Karcius at some French festival in the town of Saint-Palais-sur-Mer. A very good disc, I advise everyone. Although at first I was terribly upset, looking at a huge audience of people as much as one hundred and fifty, no less ... But then I remembered that a lot of groups finally performed in the studio, and nevertheless they recorded quite a blur of discs ... Here the option is different: the guys worked hard before an audience, albeit a small one.
title: Karcius - Live In France
